snippet.title: Symphony of the Machine - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now!
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com//app/540010
Oculus Touch - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1213740605369523/
America PSN - https://store.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/#!/cid=UP3491-CUSA07952_00-0000000000000000
Europe/Australia/NZ PSN - https://store.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/#!/cid=EP8947-CUSA06664_00-0000000000000000

Ascend the tower, awaken an ancient machine, and breathe life back into a dead world.

Symphony of the Machine is a spatial puzzle game for Oculus, Vive and PlayStation VR. Using a variety of tools, manipulate a beam of light that is capable of triggering different weather effects. Control the weather to start regrowing the world.

Symphony of the Machine, Out Now for HTC Vive and PlayStation VR.

https://symphony.stirfire.net/

Credits:

Produced and Directed by Matthew Buss
Director of Photography: Ryan Svirac
1st Assistant Director: Joshua Walker

Featuring: Andrea Lim
Digital Puppeteer: Keren Schlink

Continuity and DIT: Tom Moore
Assitant Camera: Daniel Di Franco

Creative Design: Lisa Rye
Technical Department: Brendan Ragan

Shot at Qcumber Studios

VFX Post Production by Last Pixel
